task.title: Draining the cooling system
task.shortdesc: After the second winter of running your vehicle, drain the cooling system and refill it with fresh water. Add the anti-freeze when required.

context.p:
There are two drain taps for draining the cooling system:
at the base of radiator on the forward side
on the rear of the cyclinder block.
Both taps are accessible from under the bonnet. Radiator drain taps Radiator drain taps
Some vehicles are fitted with a drain plug instead of a tap. This plug must be removed to drain the radiator.

step.cmd: Open both taps and remove the filler cap to drain the cooling system completely.

stepresult.note: Collect any anti-freeze in a clean container for future use.

step.cmd: Insert a hose in the filling orifice and allow water to flow through the system until clean.
